Introduction
================

This project predicts the **median housing values** using California census data.


Techniques Used
-----------------
- Linear Regression
- Decision Tree Regression
- Random Forest Regression

Steps Performed
-----------------

1. Data Preparation and Data Cleaning (including missing value imputation)
2. Feature Engineering and Correlation Analysis
3. Stratified Sampling and training/testing split
4. Model building using different techiques listed above
5. Model Evaluation using ** Mean Squared Error (MSE)**
